metadata.description: AI development tools - scaffolding, sidecar containers, and more

plugins.name: ai-scaffold
plugins.description: Project scaffolding with standard dev configs (biome, ruff, vitest, pytest, cursor rules, claude hooks)

plugins.name: skill-peekaboo
plugins.description: Visual UI testing for macOS apps using Peekaboo CLI - alternative to Playwright for native macOS testing

plugins.name: skill-codex
plugins.description: Delegate hard problems to OpenAI Codex as background task - codebase exploration, debugging, code review, architecture
